scripts.stop: sh -c 'pids=$(lsof -ti tcp:${PORT:-8000}); if [ -n "$pids" ]; then kill $pids || true; echo "Stopped $pids"; else echo "No process on port ${PORT:-8000}"; fi'
scripts.status: sh -c 'pids=$(lsof -ti tcp:${PORT:-8000}); if [ -n "$pids" ]; then echo "Running: $pids"; else echo "Not running"; fi'
